name: Excavator Defender
description:
Excavator Defender is a First Person Shooter and Tower Defense mix. Its core gameplay plays heavily on the features prominent in these genres.

You are tasked by Big Corps. from Earth to harvest an unnamed planet. This planet is abundant with Tungsten-Steel alloy and is highly valuable and the main purpose of your mission. You need to defend the excavation drill from the local inhabitants who do not take kind to your mining.

Survive through waves of these rocky inhabitants as you build turrents and thermal energy collectors to assist your protection of the drill.
